AAJ.caption: Title
AAJ.doc: Text to display as a title of chart
AAJ.name: title

AAM.caption: Title alignment
AAM.doc: Alignment of title relative to chart area.
AAM.name: title_alignment

AAa.caption: No data text
AAa.doc: The text to display when no-data is available. Defaults to undefined which displays nothing.
AAa.name: no_data_text

AAc.caption: Tooltip enabled
AAc.doc: Show tooltip when user hovers over chart area.
AAc.name: tooltip_enabled

AAf.caption: Downloading enabled
AAf.doc: Display the toolbar / menu in the top right corner.
AAf.name: downloading_enabled

ABH.caption: Series data y
ABH.doc: Series y values separated by comma.
ABH.name: series_data_y

ABJ.caption: Upward color
ABJ.doc: Color for the upward candle when the value/price closed above where it opened. Usually, a green color is used for this upward candle.
ABJ.name: upward_color

ABK.caption: Downward color
ABK.doc: Color for the downward candle when the value/price closed below where it opened. Usually, a red color is used for this downward candle.
ABK.name: downward_color

ABL.caption: Zoomable
ABL.doc: To allow zooming in axis charts.
ABL.name: zoomable
